newsitem.title: ROMANIA: TABLE-ROMANIA JULY UNEMPLOYMENT 6.9 PCT VS 6.8 PCT.
newsitem.headline: TABLE-ROMANIA JULY UNEMPLOYMENT 6.9 PCT VS 6.8 PCT.

text.p: Romania's unemployment rate inched up to 6.9 percent last month from 6.8 percent in June, the Labour Ministry said on Thursday.
The number of registred jobless people rose by 6,660 last month from June, it said.
NOTE -- Romania's workforce is 10.491 million. Data showed more than half of end-July unemployed persons were women.

According to government forecasts, Romania is expected to end 1997 with a jobless rate of 10.3 percent, up from 6.1 percent at end-1996, as restructuring of communist-era industries would proceed further.
